name: GaStorm
description:
This little shooter was created for the Basic Shmup Showcase.

This is my first project using GodotGameEngine.

The project source files are available on GitHub under the MIT license.

https://github.com/Edo-Hachi/GaStorm

Move the player up, down, left and right with the cursor keys or WASD. Fire the bullet with the space key. Possibly also supports XBOX gamepad (Operation confirmed on Windows).
